turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place an order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which starbucks are you trying to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order from the Starbucks on 6566 Beacon Street in Boston, Massachusetts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want whole milk in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, will that be all?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 grande cappuccino with whole milk from Starbucks on 6566 beacon street in Massachusetts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect, and the total comes out to $2.99.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want to purchase now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed your order, it'll be done in 6 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'll send your receipt to your mobile device.
